text: Yi Bok-nam (; born June 28, 1555 in Gangneung - died August 16, 1597 in Namwon) was an army general and politician of the Joseon Dynasty of Korea. He was one of Korea's generals in the Imjin War. == References == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=888269 * http://people.aks.ac.kr/front/tabCon/ppl/pplView.aks?pplId=PPL_6JOb_A9999_1_0009571&curSetPos;=0&curSPos;=0&isEQ;=true&kristalSearchArea;=B * http://koreandb.nate.com/history/people/detail?sn=1045 Category:1555 births Category:1597 deaths Category:Korean generals Category:Korean politicians
title: Yi Bok-nam
